data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Manikganj.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Manikganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Manikganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 87 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Manikganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Manikganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Manikganj.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Darzi (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Darzi (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, please give every church in the county of Manikganj a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Manikganj.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Manikganj, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
